S.FORM: 48 Anna ta matta-raæugh-â matiktik, mama ka matta-raæugh matiktik ta Raranian-oumi ka ǣiatounnoun ki vullu-vullum.
Ka annim ki lbægh ki soulat

1 Pou-lilih-ta ka assi-kamou pæ-'ǣ-ahrum ki ka-harum-noumi pæ'ǣ-æmæh ki kaeuloungtou hahi-matta-en nein: heirou k'ma-kamou-hynna, aou-si-ah-kamou ki ou-vavarg-han ki Rara-man-oumi ka æiä-tounnoun ki vullu-vullum.

2 Anna ta, herou ka pæ'ǣharum kow ki kaharum-mun, ynna pa-ï-oep ki j-oeb tou doummaymhou-an, mama ki pani-nni-en ki rÿh ki sou tou Paui-fafaal-an tou daradarang, alei ka loulough-auh ki ka-euloung: Missing koun-nau-kamou-râ maki-kahâ-to maki-valei ki ou-vavarg-han nein-da.
3 Irou-râ pæ'ǣ-harum-menhouta kaharummen, ynna pa-oumhaa ki 'eu-i-oho kamang ta ring-ei ki ouwal-da.
4 Alei ka itou-dung-ah ta pæ'ǣ-harum-enhou; ka Raramanoho ka kmi-dung kmytta pæǣpænæh-æh pæǣ-vli ymhou-an-da.
5 Irou ka makou-Alilid-kow, assi kow mah-kaulaula-ah neini-æn ka pani-nni-en ki rÿh ki sou, ka mamoei
